interlinear-text.item: You are the vision of my eyes

phrase.item: You are the vision of my eyes, You are my soul and my liver.
You are my day and night, my sweetheart.
You are the vision of my eyes. You are my soul and my liver.
You are my day and night, my sweetheart.
The fairies from the mountain brought me a sweet violet flower.
The fairies from the mountain, brought me a sweet violet flower.
They are decorating the house of my heart.
My heart is wondering. My love has become my guest.
My lot is wondering. My sweetheart.
my heart is wondering, My love has become my guest.
My lots is wondering [what to do]. My sweetheart.
You are the vision of my eyes, You are my soul and liver.
You are my day and night. My sweetheart.
You always come happily, in the street of my heart.
You always come happily, In the street of my heart.
I pull myself togehter while on the ups and downs of the road of my heart.
You are humming carefree. It echoes in the soul of my world.
Your voice is beautiful to me. My sweetheart.
You are humming carefree, It echoes in the soul of my world.
Your voice is beautiful to me. My sweetheart,
you are the vision of my eyes, you are my soul and my liver.
You are my day and night my sweetheart.
This love is like a lake of alcohol, I see your eyes, my darling.
This love is like a lake of alcohol, I see your eyes, my darling.
When I drink it, everythings turns to heaven, this world that is a prison to me.
My fate has became kind, my prison turned into a flower garden,
and [I] became the nightingale of the ghazal singers. My sweetheart.
My fate has became kind, My prison turned into a flower garden,
and [I] became the nightingale of the ghazal singers My sweetheart.
You are the vision of my eyes, You are my soul and my liver.
You are my day and night My sweetheart.
You are the vision of my eyes, You are my soul and my liver.
You are my day and night My sweetheart.
